Posts.Content: I joined this wonderful site about a month ago and subscribe to the BC forum, but have not come across my situation and wondered if someone has gone through this treatment. I was diagnosed with DCIS and have had a skin saving Mast + LD flap (back muscle) + saline implant (2 weeks post op) and now told I may need Radiotherapy but my research suggests that this is very very unusual and not to mention that Rads can also play havoc with the final look of the breast – I will not know until next week if I need Rads and am in two minds about it – but wondered if anyone else had this experience and what the outcome was? Thank you for reading.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy + LD flap + Implant = Radiotherapy
